## ShaderHelper.discardIfClipped() method

Discard the fragment if it was clipped by the clip plane

**Signature:**

```typescript
static discardIfClipped(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, worldPos: PBShaderExp): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  worldPos | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void
